name: Multiplexing code for android
short_description:
Multiplexing code for a control app to use the good old nokia hs-45 media control to Play/Pause, Stop, Track Forward, Track Back, Volume up and down, Hang up/Voice dial and use microphone for the HTC Desire S

A simple app needed to be able to use the good old nokia hs-45 media control to Play/Pause, Stop, Track Forward, Track Back, Volume up and down, Hang up/Voice dial and use microphone for the HTC Desire S for built in media player and winamp. 

1:	App must be able to tranfer the Play/Pause
2: Stop
3: Track Forward, Track Back,
4: Volume up and down
5: Hang up & Voice dial and microphone signals to any media player apps on the HTC Desire S and also be able to make calls just like it behaved on the nokia 5800
6:	App must auto run on boot up.
